src:
Klasemen Liga Inggris: Liverpool dan Man City Menang, MU Keok
02 Nov 2019, 21:54 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Hasil Liga Inggris pekan ke-11 pada Sabtu malam hingga Ahad dinihari, 3 November 2019, menyajikan kemenangan Liverpool, Manchester City, dan Chelsea. Manchester United kalah, sedangkan Arsenal hanya bermain seri.
Liverpool menang 2-1 saat berlaga di kandang Aston Villa. Tertinggal oleh gol Trezguet (menit 21), The Reds berbalik unggul lewat gol Andy Robertson (87) dan Sadio Mane (90).
Liverpool, yang belum terkalahkan, tetap mapan di puncak klasemen dengan nilai 31 dari 11 laga. Mereka unggul 6 poin dari juara bertahan Manchester City yang ada di posisi kedua.
Man City sendiri mampu menang 2-1 saat menjamu Southampton pada pekan ke-11 ini. Sempat kebobolan oleh gol James Ward Prowse (13), The Citizens memastikan kemenangan lewat gol Sergio Aguero (70) dan Kyle Walker (86).
Pada laga lain, Chelsea menang 2-1 di kandang Watford. Gol The Blues diceploskan Tammy Abraham (5) dan Christian Pulisic (55). Adapun gol Watford dicetak Gerard Deulofeu dari titik penalti (80).
Chelsea kini menempati posisi ketiga klasemen dengan nilai 23, sedangkan Watford tetap di dasar klasemen dengan nilai 5.
Pada pertandingan lain, Manchester United takluk 0-1 saat bermain di kandang Bournemouth. Gol Joshua King (45) membuat MU melorot ke urutan ke-10 klasemen dengan nilai 13, tertinggal 3 poin dari lawannya yang ada di posisi ketujuh.
Arsenal juga gagal meraih poin penuh pada pekan ini. Mereka tertahan 1-1 saat menjamu Wolverhampton. Gol Arsenal dicetak Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (21), sedangkan gol lawan diceploskan Raul Jimenez (76).
The Gunners kini menempati posisi kelima klasemen dengan nilai 17, unggul lima poin dari Wolves yang ada di posisi ke-11.
Hasil Liga Inggris pekan ke-11AFC Bournemouth 1 - 0 Manchester UnitedArsenal 1 - 1 Wolverhampton WanderersAston Villa 1 - 2 LiverpoolBrighton & Hove Albion 2 - 0 Norwich CityManchester City 2 - 1 SouthamptonSheffield United 3 - 0 BurnleyWest Ham United 2 - 3 Newcastle UnitedWatford 1 - 2 Chelsea.

text:
Premier League Standings: Liverpool and Man City Win, MU Cluck
02 Nov 2019, 21:54 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The results of the 11th week of the English Premier League on Saturday night until Sunday morning, 3 November 2019, presented the victories of Liverpool, Manchester City and Chelsea. Manchester United lost, while Arsenal only played series.
Liverpool won 2-1 while competing at home to Aston Villa. Left behind by Trezguet's goal (minute 21), the Reds turned ahead through goals from Andy Robertson (87) and Sadio Mane (90).
Liverpool, unbeaten, remain firmly on top of the standings with 31 points from 11 matches. They are 6 points ahead of defending champions Manchester City in second place.
Man City alone was able to win 2-1 at home to Southampton in this 11th week. Had conceded by goals from James Ward Prowse (13), The Citizens ensure victory through goals from Sergio Aguero (70) and Kyle Walker (86).
In another match, Chelsea won 2-1 at home to Watford. The Blues' goals were scored by Tammy Abraham (5) and Christian Pulisic (55). The Watford goal was scored by Gerard Deulofeu from the penalty spot (80).
Chelsea now ranks third in the standings with a value of 23, while Watford remain at the bottom of the standings with a value of 5.
In other matches, Manchester United defeated 0-1 while playing at home to Bournemouth. Joshua King's goal (45) made MU slipped to 10th place with 13 points, 3 points behind seventh-placed opponents.
Arsenal also failed to win full points this week. They were held 1-1 when entertaining Wolverhampton. Arsenal's goal was printed by Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (21), while the opponent's goal was struck by Raul Jimenez (76).
The Gunners now occupy fifth place standings with a value of 17, five points ahead of Wolves who are in 11th position.
